name: Constance De Jong
biography: Constance De Jong is a writer and performer based in New York. She has worked in avante-garde performance and installation and has published a number of books including 'ITILOE' and 'Modern Love'. De Jong has collaborated extensively with artist Tony Oursler in works such as the CD-Rom 'Fantastic Prayers', the video piece 'Joyride TM' and the theatrical performance 'Relatives'. She is also the author of the libretto for 'Satyagraha', an opera written by Philip Glass.
